message: This is the latest privacy policy data

result.content:
Terms & Conditions

This end user license agreement and service agreement (hereinafter referred to as the “Agreement”) is a contract between the User, as defined below, and Hitachi-Johnson Controls Air Conditioning, Inc whose Registered Office is located at 1-16-1 Kaigan, Minato-ku, Tokyo 105-0022 Japan (hereinafter referred to as “JCH”). By downloading, installing and accessing the airCloud Home application and related services, or by using them, the User undertakes to follow the provisions of this Agreement. Should the User not be in agreement regarding the provisions of this Agreement, JCH is not obligated to grant such a party the right to use airCloud Home, its related services, or to access it. Similarly, you are not permitted to download, install, use, copy or access airCloud Home nor to use its related services.

airCloud Home is an application under license not intended to be sold. Except for the limited license granted in terms of this Agreement, JCH and its licensors retain all rights, titles, interests and proprietary rights relating to airCloud Home, including copyrights, patents, trademarks and manufacturing secrets.

JCH is entitled to modify this Agreement within the framework of an airCloud Home update or at any other time following an electronic form of notification sent from JCH to the User. The User’s use of airCloud Home shall constitute their acceptance of the modified version of this Agreement.


Section1 – DEFINITIONS.

Documentation: the documentation in force that JCH generally makes available to Users for the configuration, operation and use of the airCloud Home and RAC Systems.

airCloud Home: airCloud Home is a mobile/web application with a related set of internet services allowing Users to remotely control compatible Room Air Conditioner (RAC) systems.
airCloud WIFI Adapter: JCH airCloud WIFI Adapter is the hardware component of a screen-less Central Controller that buildings operators can access through web browser. When the RAC systems are connected with airCloud WIFI Adapter, RAC systems can be controlled by airCloud Home.
JCH Cloud: JCH Cloud is the place to store the User’s account information, RAC state information, etc.
Factories: entities that develop JCH products
Information on registration: User-provided information that allows them to connect to and control RAC systems remotely.
User: any legally responsible adult or any natural or legal person who has subscribed to airCloud Home to control RAC Systems, as defined below, for their own use. The User must be the RAC Systems end user.

Section 2 – LICENCE AND RESTRICTIONS.

JCH grants the User a revocable, non-transferable, personal and non-exclusive license for use of the code version of airCloud Home on their mobile device or web. The User does not have the right to install or use airCloud Home on a device that they do not possess or do not control. The licence granted to the User is subject to the following restrictions:
• The User may use airCloud Home only for building(s) where they own or operate.
• The User may not copy or distribute airCloud Home, except in the case where such a copy is required for its installation and use, as described in this Agreement.
• The User has no right to reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, modify or create derivative works of airCloud Home, except as permitted by the laws in force.
• The User may not allocate, sub-license, rent, rent-share, loan or otherwise transfer airCloud Home, or allow a third party to copy and install, directly or indirectly, airCloud Home on a device that does not belong to the User and over which they have no control.
• The User may not remove any indication of ownership (e.g. copyright and trademark notices) of airCloud Home or its Documentation.
• airCloud Home is to be used in accordance with its Documentation.
• The User must keep airCloud Home and any Documentation strictly confidential and for their exclusive use.
• The User is to use airCloud Home in accordance with all the foreign, federal, state and local laws, rules and regulations concerned.
airCloud Home is not available in all countries. The User must view the documentation to obtain a list of the countries currently served.

Section 3 – FEEDBACK

The User is encouraged to formulate suggestions, comments or other feedback (collectively referred to as “Feedback”) on JCH products and services including airCloud Home. The provision of such feedback is optional. JCH reserves the right to use the feedback for any purpose and without obligation of any kind. Within the context that a license would be required under any intellectual property right of the User to use the feedback, the User grants JCH and its affiliates a license to use such feedback under irrevocable, international, non-exclusive, ongoing, fully paid and royalty-free conditions, with a view to improving airCloud Home and the provision of products and services.

Section 4 – LOCALISATION FUNCTIONS.

Some of the localisation functions offered in airCloud Home is provided by Google Inc. and / or other third party suppliers. The use of such functionality may be subject to additional terms and conditions (updated from time to time): http://www.google.com/intl/en-US_US/help/terms_maps.html. The User is to judge for themself the relevance and suitability of the information. All location information is fully provided “as is”, without a warranty of any kind.

Section 5 – SUPPORT FOR APPLICATIONS; FUNCTIONALITIES.

All questions and inquiries regarding airCloud Home should be sent to JCH through its currently designated support points of contact, available on the JCH website or in the Documentation. Third parties, as defined in Section 11, are not responsible for providing any assistance and should not be contacted with a view to getting assistance. JCH reserves the right to change or remove features or other characteristics of airCloud Home, at any time, and without the provision of prior notice. JCH may introduce additional features or functionalities to airCloud Home in the future; which will be subject to this Agreement.

Section 6 – COSTS.

JCH reserves the right, after notifying Users, to charge a fee for the continued use of airCloud Home, for access to certain additional features, or to use the latest versions of airCloud Home. Fees may be applied to purchases conducted within the application or paid by Users separately through JCH websites or through other means. Should a User choose not to pay the related fees, their use of the airCloud Home application and / or functionality to which such fees apply may be suspended.
The User may choose to purchase additional airCloud Home features or functionalities directly from the application. The User accepts to pay all fees related to the purchases made through airCloud Home. All fees are non-refundable and cannot be cancelled.

Section 7 - TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS, VALID EMAIL ADDRESS.

The User is responsible, at their own cost, to obtain the compatible software and equipment as well as the Internet access services required to connect airCloud Home to the internet or telecommunications services. .
The User needs to have a valid email address for registration on, and the ongoing use of airCloud Home. The User agrees to receive, if necessary, essential information regarding the registration and use of airCloud Home by email, related payments (if any), and the procedure for accessing the application for the remote control of the RAC Systems, including registration information.


Section 8 - PROCEDURE AND REGISTRATION INFORMATION

The User must create an account with JCH in order to use airCloud Home. The User agrees: (a) to provide reliable, accurate, up-to-date and full information when registering for the use of airCloud Home and when opening their account (“Registration Information”), (b) to maintain and promptly update the registration information so that it remains reliable, accurate, up-to-date and complete, and (c) to ensure that all registration information is legal, not offensive, not obscene, or otherwise inadmissible. If the User provides any information that is incorrect, inaccurate, obsolete, incomplete, or that additionally contravenes the requirements set out above, or if JCH has legitimate reasons to suspect that such information is false, inaccurate, obsolete, incomplete, or in breach of the above requirements, JCH has the right, without notice, to suspend or delete the User's account. The User is solely responsible for the confidentiality of all passwords and any usage or activity related to the account. Should the User authorise other persons to access their account or use their password, they shall do this at their own risk and under their sole responsibility.
The User may modify the registration information contained on their personal account through airCloud Home. However, the email address initially provided by the User shall be used as the account user name and may not under any circumstances be changed.
JCH reserves the right to change the registration information for technical or safety-related reasons, or if the authorities require this. In this case, JCH will inform the User promptly to this effect.
In the event of loss or fraudulent use of registration information or passwords associated with the account, the User is able to change the information or reset password according to User Manual.

Section 9 – AVAILABILITY OF THE ONLINE SERVICE

airCloud Home is used to access certain online services (considered as being included in airCloud Home’s definition in this Agreement) designed for the control of the RAC Systems. The User shall not receive any separate notification when airCloud Home may be connecting to these services. The use of airCloud Home constitutes consent from the User regarding the communication of standard information about the device (including, but not limited to, the technical information related to your devices, the system’s operational information and application software) and the airCloud WIFI Adapters’ orders related to these services. The User does not have the right to use any online service that may negatively affect these services in any manner whatsoever, that would suspend their operation, or reduce the capacity of any other User to use one of these services or the wireless network through which these services are accessed. The User does not have the right to use online services to gain unauthorised access to a service, data, account or network, or to use such in one way or another.
JCH makes reasonable efforts to make airCloud Home related online services available for use as provided for in this Agreement, however JCH is not responsible or liable in the event of unavailability resulting from any cause beyond its control, including, but not limited to, the events noted below:
• Problems in the User's environment affecting connectivity or interfering with airCloud Home, including, but not limited to, the User's telecommunications connections or any other software or equipment of the User, the firewall software of the User, hardware or security settings, configuration of the antivirus, anti-spyware or anti-malware software of the User, or User handling error;
• any software or third-party hardware or any telecommunications failure, including reduced speed or internet disruptions;
• any events of force majeure, including, but not limited to, fire, floods, earthquakes, natural elements or natural disasters; interruptions to third party work, acts of war, terrorism, riots, civil disorder, rebellions or revolutions; quarantines, embargoes and other similar government actions; or any other similar cause beyond the reasonable control of JCH;
• problems related to some server error or failure regarding domain names (DNS) of a third party; or
• the maintenance of online services.
Notwithstanding any provision of this Agreement, JCH may, at its sole discretion, suspend a User's access to the online services for any of the following reasons, in particular: (a) to avoid damage or risks to or the degradation of services; (b) to comply with the laws, regulations, court decisions or government injunctions; (c) to release JCH from any legal liability; or (d) when the User fails to pay the fees due in terms of these provisions. JCH shall make reasonable effort to inform the User before, or rapidly after the suspension of services. JCH will rapidly reactivate access to services as soon as the event responsible for the suspension has been resolved. This section shall not be interpreted as imposing the slightest obligation on or requirement on JCH relating to the monitoring of the use of services.

Section 10 - MODIFIED DEVICES.

JCH cannot be held responsible for errors, the unreliable operation, or other problems resulting from the use of airCloud Home on or in connection with unlocked or unrestricted devices or on any mobile device that does not conform to the original specifications of the manufacturer, including the use of modified versions of the operating system (collectively referred to as “Modified Devices”). The use of airCloud Home on modified devices is done solely at the User’s risk and this is under their exclusive responsibility.

Section 11 - NO RESPONSABILITY FOR THIRD-PARTIES.

The User's wireless telecommunications company, the manufacturer and retailer of your mobile device, the developer of the operating system on the User's mobile device, the managers of application shops, markets, or similar services through which the User is able to access airCloud Home, and its respective affiliates, suppliers, and licensors (collectively referred to as “Third Parties”) are not parties to this Agreement and do not possess airCloud Home nor are they responsible for them. THE USER ACKNOWLEDGES THAT (I) THIRD PARTIES DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS AND IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO airCloud Home AND, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT, TITLE, COMMERCIAL VALUE, UNHINDERED ENJOYMENT, QUALITY OF INFORMATION, AND SUITABILITY FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE; (II) IN NO CASE SHALL THIRD PARTIES BE LIABLE TO THE USER OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, EXEMPLARY, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WHETHER THEY MAY BE OF A CONTRACTUAL, DELICTUAL (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHER NATURE ARISING FROM THIS AGREEMENT OR FROM aircloud Home, EVEN IF SUCH PARTIES HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES OR LOSSES; (III) IN ANY EVENT, THE MAXIMUM LIABILITY OF ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DISPUTE WHETHER CONTRACTUAL, DELICTUAL (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHER IN NATURE OF ANY KIND WILL NOT EXCEED THE EQUIVALENT IN LOCAL CURRENCY OF FIVE US DOLLARS ($5.00); AND (IV) THE USER WAIVES ANY RIGHT TO SUBMIT ANY CLAIM, KNOWN AT THE PRESENT TIME OR DISCOVERED LATER, THAT MAY ARISE AGAINST THIRD PARTIES AND WHICH WOULD ARISE FROM THIS CONTRACT, aircloud Home. THE THIRD PARTIES ARE THE THIRD PARTIES WHO ARE BENEFICIARIES OF THIS CONTRACT, CAPABLE OF DIRECTLY EXECUTING ITS PROVISIONS. NOTHING IN THIS AGREEMENT MAY BE CONSTRUED AS CONSTITUTING ANY MODIFICATION OR CHANGE TO THE AGREEMENTS OR OTHER PROVISIONS STIPULATED BETWEEN THE USER AND THIRD PARTIES IN TERMS OF ITS SCOPE OF APPLICATION. In the event that airCloud Home or its possession or use constitute a violation of the intellectual property rights of a third party, the Third parties concerned shall not be held liable for the investigation, defence, ruling or refuting of the violation allegation.

Section 12 – USER INDEMNITY.

The User shall indemnify, defend, and shall disengage JCH, its suppliers, licensors and third parties from damages, liabilities, costs, fines, penalties and expenses arising from the breach of this Agreement by the User.

Section 13 – EXCLUSION OF WARRANTIES.

aircloud Home IS PROVIDED “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE”. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE JCH PROVIDER, ITS AFFILIATES AND THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS AND LICENSORS SHALL WAIVE ALL WARRANTIES RELATING TO aircloud Home, INCLUDING, AND NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT, TITLE, OF COMMERCIAL VALUE, UNHINDERED ENJOYMENT, QUALITY OF INFORMATION, AND SUITABILITY FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. JCH, ITS AFFILIATES AND THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS AND LICENSORS DO NOT GUARANTEE IN ANY MANNER THAT aircloud Home SHALL SATISFY THE USER'S REQUIREMENTS, OR THAT THE OPERATION OF aircloud Home SHALL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, OR THAT aircloud Home DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED.
THE USER UNDERSTANDS AND AGREES THAT aircloud Home IS NOT INTENDED FOR AND SHOULD NOT BE USED IN HIGH-RISK ACTIVITIES SUCH AS HEALTH CARE.

Section 14 – LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL JCH, ITS AFFILIATES OR ITS RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS AND LICENSORS BE LIABLE TO THE USER OR ANY OTHER THIRD PARTY FOR DIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE OR INDIRECT DAMAGES (INCLUDING CONTRACTUAL, DELICTUAL (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHER DAMAGES), INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR PERSONAL INJURY, LOST PROFITS, LOST DATA AND BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, RESULTING FROM THE USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE aircloud Home, EVEN IF THEY HAVE BEEN INFORMED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE ARISING. IN ANY EVENT, THE FULL LIABILITY OF JCH, ITS AFFILIATES AND THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS AND LICENSORS, IN TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES, AND CAUSES OF ACTION WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL, DELICTUAL (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHER IN NATURE IS LIMITED TO THE AMOUNT OF THE LICENSE FEES INITIALLY PAID, IF ANY, BY THE aircloud Home USER.

SECTION 15 – CONFIDENTIALITY OF DATA; CUMULATIVE DATA

The User grants JCH anon-exclusive, ongoing, irrevocable, fully paid, royalty-free license to use, copy, distribute, and otherwise draw on the statistical data and other cumulative data derived from its use of airCloud Home (“Cumulative Data”) for the needs of JCH’s business, including the improvement and updating of its products and services; provided that the data is combined with similar data from other JCH customers and that it does not include any information identifying the User or any other individual.

Section 16 – DURATION AND CANCELLATION.

This Agreement shall commence when the User downloads or starts using airCloud Home, and will terminate upon deletion of the User's account by User or JCH. It shall conclude as indicated elsewhere in this Agreement, or automatically in the case where the User may violate any of its terms. In the event of an allegation of intellectual property violation by a third party affiliated to airCloud Home, JCH is permitted to immediately terminate this Agreement through written or electronic notification and to prohibit any further use thereof. Moreover, JCH can choose to end the assistance and availability offered by airCloud Home at any time, without the provision of notice and at its sole discretion. This may include remote access to the airCloud Home application by interrupting its operation. Similarly, airCloud Home may stop working.

SECTION 17 – GENERAL.

airCloud Home may be subject to the import-export laws of various jurisdictions, including the United States of America. The User is solely responsible for observing foreign and local regulations relating to import-export activities. The User’s rights and obligations in virtue of this Agreement are not transferable. JCH may freely cede, transfer, delegate or subcontract all or a part of its obligations in light of these provisions. This Agreement shall only be interpreted and applied within the framework of Japanese law, notwithstanding the principles of conflicting laws. Any legal action or equity arising from this Agreement directly or indirectly can only be initiated in the Tokyo District Court of Japan. The User and JCH accept and subject themselves to the personal jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court of Japan for requirements relating to measures concerned by this Agreement and its extraterritorial meaning. The User acknowledges that regardless of the status or contrary provision of any law, any claim or cause of action that may arise from or in connection with this Agreement must be filed within one (1) year after the start of the claim or cause of action. This Agreement constitutes an integral agreement entered into between JCH and the User in terms of the purpose of these provisions and it replaces all prior or current oral or written communication relating to the purpose of this Agreement and included in it. In the case that any of the provisions of this Agreement may be considered to be invalid or not applicable following a legal ruling, the other sections thereof shall remain valid and applicable according to its provisions. Failure by JCH to strictly enforce the provisions of this Contract shall not constitute a waiver of such a provision or any consequential breach of this provision. JCH's disclaimers and limitations of liability and intellectual property protection in addition to the User compensation shall surpass termination or expiry of this Agreement. This Agreement may be accepted in electronic form (for example, by electronic means or some other means of demonstration of its consent) and the User’s acceptance shall be considered as a binding agreement between the User and JCH. Neither party may dispute the validity or enforceability of this Agreement, including under any law relating to fraud, by virtue of the fact that it has been accepted or signed in electronic form. Archives maintained electronically constitute minutes once printed on paper and shall have the same validity as the other generally recognised minutes. IT IS EXPRESSLY UNDERSTOOD AND AGREED THAT IN CASES WHERE A REMEDY IS CONSIDERED TO BE MISALIGNED WITH ITS ESSENTIAL PURPOSE, ALL LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY AND EXCLUSIONS OF DAMAGES SHALL REMAIN EFFECTIVE

Privacy Policy


Personal data (including your email address, postal address and phone number) is processed by this application, and which is required for the functionality of the application. The Controller of this data is Hitachi-Johnson Controls Air Conditioning, Inc. and the personal data will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Notice at www.johnsoncontrols.com/privacy. Your continued use of this application or your acceptance of this Notice constitutes your confirmation that you have read and understood our Privacy Notice and also constitutes your consent, only if and strictly to the extent your consent is required under applicable law.

Personal data (including your email address, postal address and phone number) is processed by this application, and which is required for the functionality of the application. The Controller of this data is Hitachi-Johnson Controls Air Conditioning, Inc. and the personal data will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Notice at www.johnsoncontrols.com/privacy. Your continued use of this application or your acceptance of this Notice constitutes your confirmation that you have read and understood our Privacy Notice at www.johnsoncontrols.com/privacy and also constitutes your consent, only if and strictly to the extent your consent is required under applicable law.
